name: WooCommerce Table Rate Currency Converter
author: Gabriel Reguly, omniWP

sections.description:
Allows the use of a local currency for table rate shippings.

This plugin enables the use of a local currency for table rate shippings.

This does not affect the currency in which you take payment.

Conversions are estimated based on data from the Open Source Exchange Rates API with no guarantee whatsoever of accuracy.

Please notice that WooCommerce, WooCommerce Currency Converter Widget and WooCommerce Table Rate Shipping must be installed and active.

WooCommerce Table Rate Shipping => http://www.woothemes.com/products/table-rate-shipping/
WooCommerce Currency Converter Widget => http://www.woothemes.com/products/currency-converter-widget/
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin files to your plugins folder, or install using WordPress’ built-in Add New Plugin installer
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. There will be a new Shipping Method for WooCommerce
sections.faq:
What is the plugin license?

  • This plugin is released under a GPL license.

upgrade_notice.2.0: • Updated to WooCommerce 2.4, all users must update.
